items.title: Amgen: Biosimilars And Rare Disease Pipeline Crucial To Overcome Patent Cliff Concerns
items.description: Amgen's expanding rare disease and biosimilar portfolios, coupled with growth potential and dividend history make AMGN stock a strong long-term opportunity.

items.title: What Makes Amgen (AMGN) a New Buy Stock
items.description: Amgen (AMGN) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.
